detaileddescription.para: Collection of useful extensions for clients interested in using Hydra.

sect1.title: Overview
sect1.para: Hdx builds on the abstractions established by Hd, providing abstractions and extensions useful for clients interested in using Hydra for imaging.

It currently houses common tasks, such as:
HdxColorizeTask
HdxFullscreenShader
HdxRenderSetupTask
HdxRenderTask
HdxSelectionTask
HdxShadowTask
HdxSimpleLightTask
It also houses HdxTaskController, which wraps the above tasks and provides setters for these tasks' params. It attempts to encapsulate some of the task-specific boiler plate code when using Hydra to render a scene.
